ROOT.name: Root Sector
ROOT.description: The foundational layer of the Netgrid. Stable, grounded, and the origin point for all traversal.

PULSE.name: Pulse Sector
PULSE.description: A rhythmic zone of energy and motion. Data flows like a heartbeat, steady and strong.

ARCHIVE.name: Archive Sector
ARCHIVE.description: A vast library of memory clusters and preserved data. Knowledge echoes through every node.

FIREWALL.name: Firewall Sector
FIREWALL.description: A defensive stronghold of protective protocols. Heat and pressure define its digital terrain.

DREAM.name: Dream Sector
DREAM.description: A surreal, shifting landscape where logic bends and imagination shapes reality.

CLOUD.name: Cloud Sector
CLOUD.description: A floating expanse of distributed data. Light, airy, and everâ€‘changing.

ECHO.name: Echo Sector
ECHO.description: A resonant chamber of repeating signals and mirrored data. Every action leaves a trace.

CORE.name: Core Sector
CORE.description: The central processing nexus of the Netgrid. Power, precision, and perfect order.

VOID.name: Void Sector
VOID.description: A dark, silent expanse where data collapses and entropy reigns.

CORRUPT.name: Corrupt Sector
CORRUPT.description: A chaotic realm of glitches, anomalies, and unstable code. Dangerous and unpredictable.
